translations.bn: তারা ছেড়ে গিয়েছিল কত উদ্যান ও প্রস্রবন
translations.en: How much they left behind of gardens and springs
translations.id: Betapa banyak taman-taman dan mata air-mata air yang mereka tinggalkan
translations.tr: Orada nice bahçeler, pınarlar, ekinler, güzel konaklar, eğlenip durdukları nimetler bırakmışlardı
